content.heading: Multimedia Overview
paragraphs: Web pages incorporate multimedia like images, audio, and video for enhanced user experience.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Early browsers supported only text; modern browsers handle colors, fonts, images, and multimedia.

content.heading: Multimedia Formats
paragraphs: Multimedia files use extensions like .wav, .mp3, .mp4, .mpg, .wmv, and .avi to indicate format.
